comment: AMAZIINNGGGG!!!! The only thing I do not like is in the options to "Manage Storage" there is option to delete blurry photos, files that are too big, and some other thing... No where can I find an option to DELETE DUPLICATES!!!!!! Which is what I need the most! The option for it popped up on my screen ONCE the past like 2 years and since then haven't been able to find it.. That's very inconvenient.. because if I could find that I wouldn't of had to pay for extra storage... Which bring me to my
key sentence: Encounter the duplicate deletion option once previously within a span of two years and be unable to find it again.
